title: Smithsonian Picks Two Sites for Museums Honoring Latinos and Women
description: The Smithsonian board did not decide which museum will go where, and will not, until Congress approves the locations on the National Mall.
dc:creator: Zachary Small
category: National Museum of the American Latino
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: The Smithsonian has selected two sites along the National Mall that it is proposing as optimal locations for new museums to honor American Latinos and women.
